Then, let's get started immediately!\""},{"lineNumber":101979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああっ！？　おじ様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah! Uncle!\""},{"lineNumber":101980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":101981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？　アールコート？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Arlcote?\""},{"lineNumber":101982,"originalJapaneseLine":"アールコートは湯の中に頭から突っ込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arlcote plunged her head into the hot water."},{"lineNumber":101983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「湯あたり……ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heatstroke... it seems...\""},{"lineNumber":101984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、何してるんですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, what are you doing...?\""},{"lineNumber":101985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何をなさる気だったかは聞きませんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't ask what you intended to do,"},{"lineNumber":101986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この状態の彼女に無茶はさせられません。","translatedEnglishLine":" but I can't let her do anything reckless in this state."},{"lineNumber":101987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　服を着せたら部屋に帰しますから」","translatedEnglishLine":" I'll dress her and send her back to the room.\""},{"lineNumber":101988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その方が良さそうですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That seems for the best.\""},{"lineNumber":101989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふにゃああああ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Funyaaaa...\""},{"lineNumber":101990,"originalJapaneseLine":"アールコートは全身を真っ赤にしたまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"Arlcote, her entire body flushed red,"},{"lineNumber":101991,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザとクリームに介抱されていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was being tended to by Urza and Cream."},{"lineNumber":101992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くううう……も、もう少しだったのにぃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... I was so close...\""},{"lineNumber":101993,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はううう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha, haaa...\""},{"lineNumber":101994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おじ様に……裸……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uncle saw me... naked...\""},{"lineNumber":101995,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見られちゃった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He saw me...\""},{"lineNumber":101996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どきどき……どきどき……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thump thump... thump thump...\""},{"lineNumber":101997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リーザス軍、総大将バレス・プロヴァンス！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"General Bares Provence of the Leazas Army!"},{"lineNumber":101998,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これよりランス殿の指揮下に！」","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, under Lord Rance's command!\""},{"lineNumber":101999,"originalJapaneseLine":"「またこうしてランス殿の指揮下に入り、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To once again be under Lord Rance's command,"},{"lineNumber":102000,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦うことが出来るなど想像もしておりませなんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I never imagined I would be able to fight."},{"lineNumber":102001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm.\""},{"lineNumber":102002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アールコートよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Arlcote,"},{"lineNumber":102003,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス殿のそばは勉強になることも多かろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Being by Lord Rance's side will teach you many things."},{"lineNumber":102004,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見逃すことのないようにな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Make sure you don't overlook anything.\""},{"lineNumber":102005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ、頑張ります」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes, I'll do my best.\""},{"lineNumber":102006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいか、確かにお前はそこそこ偉いが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen, you are fairly important, but"},{"lineNumber":102007,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は俺の部下。言うこと聞かなきゃ追い出すぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"right now you are my subordinate. If you don’t obey, I'll kick you out.\""},{"lineNumber":102008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほっほっ、言われずとも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hohoho, you don’t even have to say it.\""},{"lineNumber":102009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このバレス・プロヴァンス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is Bares Provence."},{"lineNumber":102010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　上官に逆らうほど、もうろくしてませんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m not old enough to disobey my superior.\""},{"lineNumber":102011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そかそか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?"},{"lineNumber":102012,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様に絶対服従か」","translatedEnglishLine":"Absolute obedience to me, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":102013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無論」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course.\""},{"lineNumber":102014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでも言うこと聞くか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll obey anything you say.\""},{"lineNumber":102015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当然」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Naturally.\""},{"lineNumber":102016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、アールコートちゃんを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, make Arlcote-chan"},{"lineNumber":102017,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リーザス軍総大将にすげ替えろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"the General of the Leazas Army."},{"lineNumber":102018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バレスはトイレ掃除係に降格な」","translatedEnglishLine":"Demote Bares to toilet cleaning duty.\""},{"lineNumber":102019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬうっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nuu!?\""},{"lineNumber":102020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖いなら、俺も我慢するが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're scared, I'll endure it too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……その……」
ランスが肌で感じていた、
アールコートの体の震えが徐々に弱くなる。
「お、おじ様のすることなら……
何をされても……こ、怖くないです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter what you do... I-I'm not scared..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　それでは、早速ー！」
「あ、ああっ！？　おじ様！」
「へ？　アールコート？」
アールコートは湯の中に頭から突っ込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arlcote plunged her head into the hot water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「湯あたり……ですね……」
「まったく、何してるんですか……」
「何をなさる気だったかは聞きませんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I won't ask what you intended to do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この状態の彼女に無茶はさせられません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I can't let her do anything reckless in this state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 服を着せたら部屋に帰しますから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll dress her and send her back to the room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その方が良さそうですね」
「ふにゃああああ……」
アールコートは全身を真っ赤にしたまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arlcote, her entire body flushed red,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザとクリームに介抱されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was being tended to by Urza and Cream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くううう……も、もう少しだったのにぃ……」
「は、はううう……」
「お、おじ様に……裸……
見られちゃった……」
「どきどき……どきどき……」
「リーザス軍、総大将バレス・プロヴァンス！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General Bares Provence of the Leazas Army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これよりランス殿の指揮下に！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, under Lord Rance's command!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「またこうしてランス殿の指揮下に入り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To once again be under Lord Rance's command,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うことが出来るなど想像もしておりませなんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never imagined I would be able to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー」
「アールコートよ、
ランス殿のそばは勉強になることも多かろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being by Lord Rance's side will teach you many things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見逃すことのないようにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure you don't overlook anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ、頑張ります」
「いいか、確かにお前はそこそこ偉いが、
今は俺の部下。言うこと聞かなきゃ追い出すぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right now you are my subordinate. If you don’t obey, I'll kick you out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっほっ、言われずとも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohoho, you don’t even have to say it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このバレス・プロヴァンス。
上官に逆らうほど、もうろくしてませんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not old enough to disobey my superior."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そかそか。
俺様に絶対服従か」
「無論」
「なんでも言うこと聞くか」
「当然」
「では、アールコートちゃんを
リーザス軍総大将にすげ替えろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the General of the Leazas Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスはトイレ掃除係に降格な」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demote Bares to toilet cleaning duty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬうっ！？」
「ええっ！？」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being by Lord Rance's side will teach you many things.
